createyourowntour.decription: You can choose your own destination, or mix with the provided package with your tourist bucket list. Contact Gan Bali Tour for personalized and authentic experiences. Email us at info@ganbalitour.com or call/WhatsApp +6238-9256-8969

ubudcanetour.decription: Immerse yourself in Culture, Adventure, Nature, and Taste of Ubud in 1 day.

kintamanitour.decription: A perfect journey if you wanted to see the beauty of the cleanest village in the world by going through Batur Mountains and Lake.

historyofthebeginningtour.decription: This journey will bring you through the story of Karangasem King and Bali Aga as the oldest Balinese Community’s Lifestyle.

southbalitour.decription: If you are looking for the best sunset pleasure, let’s explore the south part of Bali with Gan Bali Tour.

westgatetour.decription: A Journey to West Part of Bali to capture your moment in Handara Iconic Gate with its stunning architecture and picturesque surroundings.

ubudtour.decription: Spend your day in Ubud, the famous Place for its art and nature

adayoftemplestour.decription: A journey designed for you to feel the true Bali, which is well known as “the island of thousand temples”.

eastbalitour.decription: As the beginning of the east part exploration, this tour is started to the east gate of Bali, where the sun rises.

bedugultour.decription: Feel the fresh atmosphere in Bali by joining this tour. You will be amazed by the landscape of Botanical Garden.

lembongantour.decription: Cross the sea by speed boat, then you will immersed by paradise of snorkeling island.
